title: [parallel-queries] DepGraph::previous_work_products could be made immutable to avoid shared mutable state

labels.name: C-enhancement
labels.description: Category: An issue proposing an enhancement or a PR with one.

labels.name: E-mentor
labels.description: Call for participation: This issue has a mentor. Use RustcContributor::new on Zulip for discussion.

body:
[DepGraph::previous_work_products](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/c88992d00169f15d8ff9edac8901245b4d21e1c1/src/librustc/dep_graph/graph.rs#L76-L80) is a field in the dep-graph that contains the list of object files cached during the previous compilation session. In theory, this information is available already at the time when we load the previous dep-graph and thus the field could be made immutable (i.e. not use an `RwLock`) and be initialized at `DepGraph` construction time.

Refactoring this would need the following steps:
- [Load the previous work products data](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/c88992d00169f15d8ff9edac8901245b4d21e1c1/src/librustc_incremental/persist/load.rs#L43-L78) already in [load_dep_graph()](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/c88992d00169f15d8ff9edac8901245b4d21e1c1/src/librustc_incremental/persist/load.rs#L151) instead of in [dep_graph_tcx_init()](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/c88992d00169f15d8ff9edac8901245b4d21e1c1/src/librustc_incremental/persist/load.rs#L28)
- Pass previous work products data as parameter to [DepGraph::new()](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/c88992d00169f15d8ff9edac8901245b4d21e1c1/src/librustc/dep_graph/graph.rs#L93)
- Remove the `RwLock` around the [DepGraph::previous_work_products](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/c88992d00169f15d8ff9edac8901245b4d21e1c1/src/librustc/dep_graph/graph.rs#L76-L80) field.

cc @rust-lang/wg-compiler-performance
